fullplot: Adaptation of Lois Duncan's thriller about four teenagers trying to cover up a hit-and-run. Love Hewitt plays Julie, a high school senior who goes trip with her friends and accidently hits a fisherman. They think he is dead and dump him into the waters. But later they get a strange letter that says "I know what you did last summer."
plot: Four teens are in great danger one year after their car hits a stranger whose body they dump in the sea.
title: I Know What You Did Last Summer
